text: <s>[INST] What is the capital of France? [/INST] The capital of France is Paris.</s>
<s>[INST] Explain Newton's first law of motion. [/INST] Newton's first law states that an object will remain at rest or in uniform motion unless acted upon by an external force.</s>

<s>[INST] Write a Python function to compute the factorial of a number. [/INST] Sure! Here's the function:
```python
def factorial(n):
    return 1 if n == 0 else n * factorial(n - 1)
```</s>
